timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Chase Woodruff
timelineItems.text: Hope I’m wrong, but watch this game come down to a counter that Donovan would have put away. #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: USA Believer
timelineItems.text: We are 0-16-4 when conceding the first goal. Oh well continue to believe! #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Fabian Johnson (USA) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jermaine Jones.
Corner,  USA. Conceded by Bruno Alves.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: First foray forward for the #USA. Jones springs Johnson who cuts in on his left and drills a shot. Out for a corner. Nice move. #USAvPOR 0-1

timelineItems.name: Tom
timelineItems.text: Don't care who wins, want USA to qualify but Portugal because of Ronaldo �� #USAvPOR

timelineItems.text: do you believe in unlikelihoods! #USAvPOR

timelineItems.text: Hopefully numbers lie! #USMNT #USvsPortugal

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne

timelineItems.name: Jon Clark
timelineItems.text: Not sure Dempsey up top by himself is a good idea. He doesn't work nearly hard enough. Means too little pressure on their defense. #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: JP DeLuca
timelineItems.text: 4-5-1? Don't think I've seen #USMNT play this ever under Klinsmann. I've seen 4-2-3-1 4-4-2, 4-3-3, and 4-3-2-1, never a 4-5-1...

timelineItems.text: My prediction: US 1-0 over Portugal goal scored by Graham Zusi #USMNT #1N1T

timelineItems.desc:
Jesse Marsch and Matt Doyle breakdown the weaknesses in Portugal's defense in a special "nerd-edition" of Brazil Bound.

For more World Cup coverage: http://www.mlssoccer.com/WorldCup

Brazil Bound Giveaway rules:
http://www.mlssoccer.com/brazilboundgiveawayrules
timelineItems.title: How the USMNT attack can succeed against Portugal | Brazil Bound

timelineItems.text: Zusi's playing really well. Showing his class on the biggest stage. #SportingKC #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Portugal. Nani tries a through ball, but Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Ry Herhold
timelineItems.text: DEANDRE YEDLIN THE AKRON ZIP IS ON THE FIELD IN THE WORLD CUP FOR TEAM USA #USMNT #GOZIPS

timelineItems.name: Emily Ann Hull
timelineItems.text: Ronaldo is all attitude right now. #USAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Clint Dempsey (USA).
Ricardo Costa (Portugal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
João Moutinho (Portugal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: Did the ref just do the MJ shrug when the Portuguese player looked for a penalty? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jëff Klose
timelineItems.text: That yellow was worth it. #USA #POR #USAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Geoff Cameron (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ricardo Costa (Portugal).

timelineItems.name: Casey Grogan
timelineItems.text: First few touches for Yedlin have been solid. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by William Carvalho (Portugal).

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones anotó su primer gol con la selección estadounidense; además ¡GOLAZO! http://t.co/Kwe7eDJgsq #USAvPOR http://t.co/OWCIn5TlYd

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones anotó su primer gol con la selección estadounidense; además ¡GOLAZO! http://t.co/Kwe7eDJgsq #USAvPOR http://t.co/OWCIn5TlYd

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Matt Besler (USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Besler is down and it's not looking good #USMNT #USA

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Christopher McKenzie
timelineItems.text: John Brooks time???? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: tag you're it
timelineItems.text: How many hamstrings have we to give for our country? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Matt
timelineItems.text: Who do you blame when it's the entire back line's fault? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: jeffersonmok
timelineItems.text: #USMNT is much improved. Biggest flaw now: passing has no zip, like they’re afraid to trap hard passes. Negates strong running. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nani (Portugal) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by João Moutinho.

timelineItems.name: piff
timelineItems.text: #RISKEVERYTHING #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Michael Bradley (USA) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: 5ftMunchkin
timelineItems.text: Hahaha amazing #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: GOAL DEMPSEY! 2-1 LEAD WITH 10 MINUTES TO GO. #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Matthew
timelineItems.text: THE KID! IT WAS THE KID THAT CROSSED IT!!! #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Eder (Portugal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Delay in match DaMarcus Beasley (USA) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).
Silvestre Varela (Portugal) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. Miguel Veloso (Portugal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by João Moutinho.
Offside, Portugal. Miguel Veloso tries a through ball, but Eder is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Tommy Coppers
timelineItems.text: Dempsey has the best chest I've ever seen. #USA #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡DEUCE! Clint Dempsey anotó su cuarto gol en Copas Mundiales: http://t.co/upqRPuN9tS #USAvPOR http://t.co/wLb8lMIf7L

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡DEUCE! Clint Dempsey anotó su cuarto gol en Copas Mundiales: http://t.co/upqRPuN9tS #USAvPOR http://t.co/wLb8lMIf7L

timelineItems.name: Harry H. Aharon Jr.
timelineItems.text: Give the #USA credit. These guys don't quit. #USMNT #USAvsPOR

timelineItems.name: Paul Carmichael
timelineItems.text: Just tell me it's over please!!!#WorldCup2014 #USMNT #USAvsPortugal

timelineItems.name: Emily D
timelineItems.text: Clint Dempsey is the man! No doubt about it #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portugal. Conceded by Tim Howard.

timelineItems.name: Darrius L
timelineItems.text: I'm not a soccer person, but this is actually interesting. Go #USMNT USAvsPOR

timelineItems.name: Gradon Tripp
timelineItems.text: I don't even watch soccer and I'm near tears right now. #USMNT #WorldCup cc: @NoOneYouKnow

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Cristiano Ronaldo (Portugal) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by João Moutinho with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Jeff Poblete
timelineItems.text: Howard you Beast! #USMNT #TeamUSA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: The revolving questions about Klinsmann's back line now starting to turn into exclamation marks, but the bad kind. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Alejandro Bedoya (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nani (Portugal).

timelineItems.name: Chris Goble
timelineItems.text: JUST HOLD ON!!!!! HOLD THE LINE!!!!!!#USA #USAvsPortugal #USMNT #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Kyle Kidwell
timelineItems.text: I've never seen a clock run down this slow #1N1T #USMNT #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: F. Quick
timelineItems.text: FOUR MINUTES? bloody hell! #USMNT #USA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: DJ Meeks
timelineItems.text: Zusi off, Gonzalez on, with a little time wasting. Be smart, Omar. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: BamaFootballFan
timelineItems.text: #cantwatch #nervous #OneNationOneTeam #USMNT #WorldCup2014 #USA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Cristiano Ronaldo (Portugal) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Miguel Veloso with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ian Eccles
timelineItems.text: Of course it's not Ronaldo's #WorldCup as he was injured going into it! Was never gonna be! #USAPOR #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Johan Lieu
timelineItems.text: No. #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: James Browne
timelineItems.text: Ouch #USAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Slade Wilson
timelineItems.text: Saw that coming smh smh smh #USAvsPOR #USMNT

timelineItems.name: HJ
timelineItems.text: Wicked ball in by Ronnie! #USAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, USA 2, Portugal 2.
